hero.desc: Simple, effective, and natural. Join millions improving their health with our intuitive fasting tracker. No diets, just timing.

features.title: Why Posto?
features.desc1: Everything you need to reach your health goals
features.desc2: We provide the tools, you provide the dedication

items.desc1: Customizable timers for 16:8, 18:6, 20:4, or custom fasting windows tailored to your daily schedule.
items.desc2: Visualize your progress with beautiful weekly charts, weight tracking, and key health markers.
items.desc3: Access thousands of expert-approved recipes and meal suggestions perfect for your eating window.
items.desc4: Stay properly hydrated with water intake tracking. Set goals, receive notifications, and motivational reminders.
items.desc5: Monitor your weight with easy progress charts. Automatic BMI calculation and unit conversions.
items.desc6: Learn about the 7 metabolic phases during fasting - from the fed state to deep ketosis. Education about what's happening in your body.

items.desc1: Posto has revolutionized my approach to eating. The simple interface and great features make it my favorite fasting tracker.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.desc2: No hidden fees. No credit card required.
pricing.desc3: Enjoy all features completely free. We believe in accessible health tools for everyone.
pricing.download: No credit card required. Just download and start.

footer.title: Ready to transform your life?
footer.desc: Join the community and start your journey to a healthier you today.

1.title: 1. General Provisions
1.desc: These Terms of Service define the rules for using the Posto mobile application. The application is owned by DeveloArt Mateusz Bukowski and serves to track intermittent fasting, monitor hydration, and analyze health progress. By using the application, you accept these Terms of Service.

2.title: 2. Application Features
2.desc: The application offers: tracking intermittent fasting sessions, monitoring water intake, recording weight measurements, displaying metabolic state information, statistics and progress analysis, and hydration reminder notifications. All features are provided free of charge.

3.title: 3. Purpose of the Application
3.desc: The application serves to track fasting time and eating windows (tracker), and is NOT a medical advice guide. The user uses it at their own risk. The application does not replace professional medical, nutritional, or psychological advice.

4.title: 4. Terms of Use
4.desc: The user agrees to provide truthful data (age, weight, gender), which affects calculated requirements and proposed plans. The application sends reminders about starting/ending fasting according to the user's set schedule.

5.title: 5. Intermittent Fasting Rules
5.desc: Fasting period is the time when calorie consumption is prohibited. Allowed: water (still), black coffee (no milk or sugar), tea, and herbal infusions. Eating window is the time when meals are consumed.

list.3: 16:8 - Lean Gains (16h fasting, 8h eating) - most popular
list.6: 23:1 - OMAD - One Meal A Day (23h fasting, 1h eating)

examples.title: Example schedules:
examples.2: 36-hour Fast: Fast from dinner to dinner the next day. Recommended 2-3 times per week
examples.3: Water Fast (72h): Longer fasts require consuming only water, coffee, or tea

6.title: 6. Contraindications
6.desc: People with chronic diseases, diabetes, eating disorders, pregnant or breastfeeding women should NOT fast without consulting a doctor.
6.sideEffects: Possible side effects: vitamin/mineral deficiencies, electrolyte imbalances, weakened immunity, dizziness, fatigue.
6.stop: If you feel unwell or experience dizziness - IMMEDIATELY BREAK THE FAST.

7.title: 7. Liability
7.desc: The application is provided 'as is' without warranties. The owner is not liable for damages resulting from using the app or user's health decisions. User uses the app at their own risk. Consult a doctor before starting fasting.

8.title: 8. Intellectual Property
8.desc: All intellectual property rights to the Posto application belong to DeveloArt Mateusz Bukowski. Copying, modifying, or distributing the app without written permission is prohibited.

9.title: 9. Contact and Final Provisions
9.desc: Contact: Kontakt@develoart.com. Terms of Service are governed by Polish law. The user has the right to delete the app and data at any time.

1.title: 1. General Information
1.desc: This Privacy Policy describes how the Posto application collects, uses, and protects user data. The application is owned by DeveloArt Mateusz Bukowski. By using the application, the user consents to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

2.title: 2. Data Collected
2.desc: The application collects the following data:

list.1: Data entered by the user: dates and times of fasting session start/end, body weight measurements, water intake, user preferences
list.2: Automatically collected data: device information (model, OS, app version), data necessary for notifications
list.3: The app does NOT collect: location data, biometric data, contact information, health sensor data

3.title: 3. Data Storage
3.desc: All user data is stored locally on the user's device using AsyncStorage. Data is NOT transmitted to external servers or the cloud. The user has full control over their data and can delete it at any time (function available in app settings).

4.title: 4. Data Use
4.desc: Collected data is used exclusively for: tracking intermittent fasting sessions, calculating statistics and progress, hydration reminders, and personalizing the user experience. Data is NOT sold to third parties or used for ad profiling.

5.title: 5. User Rights
5.desc: In accordance with GDPR, the user has the right to:

list.3: Delete their data (function available in the app)

6.title: 6. Security
6.desc: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect user data. Data is stored locally, meaning only the user has access to it. We recommend using device security (PIN, fingerprint) and not sharing an unlocked device with others.

7.title: 7. Data Sharing
7.desc: User data is NOT shared with third parties, except for legal requirements (at the request of law enforcement) or external applications that the user voluntarily integrates (e.g., Apple Health, Google Fit).

8.title: 8. Contact
8.desc: For privacy-related matters, please contact: Kontakt@develoart.com. The Privacy Policy is governed by Polish law.
